description: A passionate full stack engineer, having experiences in building web applications with Express.js / FastAPI / Angular and some other frameworks.
descriptions: I'm a senior software engineer from Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia, specialising in full-stack development with a strong focus on backend implementation. My expertise spans Python, Node.js, Angular and some other frameworks.

I describe myself as a passionate developer in learning new technologies and continuously expanding my skill set. I excel in both team-based environments and independent work, whether collaborating with others or working autonomously.
Life is about balance, and I love embracing every part of it. That's why I appreciate remote opportunities, as it provides the flexibility to balance my professional and personal life effectively.
